nodes.text: Incursion was a roleplaying-game adventure in year three of the Living Force campaign. It was the first adventure in the Belted In trilogy and was written by Jae Walker and Victor Long.

The heroes are sent by Nirama to get supplies past a Thaereian military blockade to a remote Cularin Militia base in the Cularin system asteroid belt. However, when they arrive, they instead find a squad of Thaereian troops waiting for them.
